id: Erection of part single/part two storey rear extension with stepped access to garden.

Erection of single storey side extension, new front porch, change to flat roof on existing single storey rear extension and roof alterations to include hip to gable and rear dormer windows to facilitate loft conversion.
Non-material amendment sought to planning permission ref 24/00569/FUL to change from pitched roof to flat roof on single storey rear extension.
Application for approval of details reserved by condition 6(Landscaping) of permission 24/01548/FUL for nursery extension
addr: Pixies Tree Pre School 63 Portsmouth Road Southampton SO19 9BE
